author: andreas
content: Well, for me it's mostly the search for geometry. This whole fisheye business is seemingly much about spirals, not about straight lines and certainly not about lines running into corners. Actually I like this image. It's one of a series of three, taken within two minutes. You can really see how the light fades away. This one almost was too dark, but there's a lot of reserve in what the D300 records. I chose it for the perfect position of the waiter ðŸ™‚
